name: Beach Blitz
description:
Yeah, this game sucks, I'll fix later. I never got to playtest (again) so i dont know how it ends either.... good luck!

You play as a little boy (with like, no HP), who wants to go swimming, but big (weak) crabs and evil water balloons are in the way (great plot 9:50 PM Eli)

Controls:

AD - Move

S - Guard

W - Jump

Click - Select
